website_summaries.verdict: Get the HTC 10 if you want a phone that delivers great audio. For all your other needs, look elsewhere.
pros: The HTC 10 has an elegantly chiseled design, brilliant audio quality and a highly customizable user interface
cons: The handset's non-removeable battery doesn't last as long as its competitors and its camera doesn't always render exposure correctly

customer_reviews.title: Review!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the worst phone I've had. If not the worst. It hasn't been a year yet, and the battery dies couple times a day in random percentages. It doesn't turn on again without getting plugged into a charger. Not to mention the bad calibration of the screen. So if you have three choices to choose from,it only lets you choose the first or the last, never the middle one. And if you open the camera to take a photo on a charging less than 40% it turns off on its own. It's a terrible experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone. Grreatly reduced in price now.
customer_reviews.text: I have has this model of phone for 3 years. Mine cost $550, a special, low price at the time. It was rated as one of the top phones at the time, with its Qualcomm 820 processor. Mine has worked fantastically well for these 3 years. So with this low price now, I decided to pick up an extra one.
customer_reviews.author: Made new

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best phone that i have had, I really enjoy HTC 10.
customer_reviews.author: Kike Vega

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Over heat but i think is normal on the htc m10 thanks

customer_reviews.title: Best HTC Phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone it self is beautiful, really does look a lot like an iPhone. Many storage space and works great with cricket wireless. Only problem I had was when I did the system update phone overheated and went black. Contacted the seller and replaced it free of charge. So stay away from updating the system. Over great phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: What's to say.. It is definitely one of the best phone of 2016... Although the description says the 4G won't work on T-Mobile it works on my phone just a heads up.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was for my wife. She said "be careful purchasing, less options for the most obvious things". She's got two days to decide, and is taking that pretty seriously lol, she say's she'd just like to have her HTC m8 back

customer_reviews.title: 64GB VERSION CRASHED 4 times in 2 days, 32GB IS PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: DONT BUY 64GB VERSION! CRASHED 4 times in 2 days (it is taiwan version, a worse one) 32GB VERSION IS PERFECT. I love this one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SCREEN DEFECT ??? Notification panel doesn't slide down!
customer_reviews.text: Notification panel doesn't slide down! I can't pull down the notification bar when I swipe down from the top. I noticed this when I first start setting up the phone so I did a factory reset and wiped the cache partition and set it up again but it hasn't done anything.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanna Morote Rios

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the phone in March 2017. Lately, the phone call function is completely out of services. No incoming or out calling is allowed. This is not acceptable for a new phone that is only a couple months old with the very new model. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS GARBAGE.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Qi Tan

customer_reviews.title: It didn't live up to my expectations. I thought ...
customer_reviews.text: It didn't live up to my expectations. I thought it would have an Arabic language and an international adapter but unfortunately it didn't. so I encourage everyone to not make up their minds in purchasing this item until they make sure that their mother language is included. my friend bought the same commodity and it came with an Arabic language. I wonder why mine is not accompanied by an Arabic language??!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't intl roam with T-Mobile
customer_reviews.text: Camera is the best one I've seen, phone is thin, looks good, works great. The only problem is that the included TMobile free international data doesn't work on this phone. Inside the US all works fine but when you roam on your TMobile simcard then the internet doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Gaia321

customer_reviews.title: when I opening was amazing, phone is great and nice shape

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone, after 2 months I don't have any problem. I hope they can provide Android N soon, I know they are working to provide it for November or December
customer_reviews.author: William Díaz

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This phone rocks... It is purely a matter of preference, they focused on things that matter to me hence i just love my HTC 10.
customer_reviews.author: Rzarecters cc

customer_reviews.title: I recieved a defected one.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for few minutes. This happened. I turned the phone off and on. Still same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Abduh Alharbi

customer_reviews.title: Both phones were great. This year I would an HTC 10
customer_reviews.text: FILED A COMPLAIN. I've been a loyal HTC client for 6 years. Had an HTC One 7 and an HTC One 8. Both phones were great. This year I bought an HTC 10. It turned out to be simply an awful experience. I contacted the HTC Support Team to request an exchange for another HTC 10 or, even better and my absolute preference, an HTC U11 -I was willing to pay the difference for the upgrade. To make a long story short, I was only given the option of repairing the defective unit I got. Very wrong. HTC, know that you have lost a loyal customer. I have been disappointed by HTC.﻿
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Echezuria

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months of usage its been great! powerful camera battery and extremely smooth
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Terrible phone. Worked fine for about 5 months and ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible phone. Worked fine for about 5 months and then the touchscreen went defective and would not let me click on anything. Brought it to sprint to have it sent out which took 3 weeks for HTC to get back to me. They sent me a new phone which lasted 4 months and now it constantly restarts. I've had HTC since the M7 but at this point I'm done with them
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: M8 is BETTER
customer_reviews.text: I could not believe that this HTC 10 thing will be this bad. I purchased the Fully Unlocked version New sealed from HTC.COM USA themselves. Trust me, from my experience, the HTC M8 still the best HTC device ever. I waited long enough to receive this phone, but I was very disappointed. My main issues are ( signal issues and coverage, keyboard typing issues, apps crashing) The only thing that I am glad that I did was I purchased this phone when it was on Promotion $150 off, so at least I would not loss as much when I sell it now. Waiting for the Galaxy S8.
customer_reviews.author: Sadeq Bazara

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth issue
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth issues if hooked up through car or something it will consistently disconnect, and there is nothing you can do about it
customer_reviews.author: Plumber29

product_meta.title: HTC 10 32GB GSM Unlocked LTE Quad-Core Android Phone w/ 12MP Camera - (International) Gold
feature_bullets: Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carrier such as AT&T and T-Mobile, but are not compatible with CDMA carriers such as Verizon and Sprint.

5.2 inches Super LCD5 capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors, Dual-core 2.15 GHz & Dual-core 1.6 GHz, Qualcomm MSM8996 Snapdragon 820 CPU, 32 GB Internal Storage, 4 GB RAM, Camera (Main): 12 MP, f/1.8, 26mm, OIS, laser autofocus, dual-LED (dual tone) flash; Camera (Front): 5 MP .
This device may not include a US warranty as some manufacturers do not honor warranties for international items. Please contact the seller for specific warranty information.
The box contains: Your new device, USB cable, Charger (may be foreign) If so, a FREE US adapter will be included, Documentation.

Please check if your GSM cellular carrier supports the bands for this model before purchasing, *** NO LTE IN USA*** as this is the international model: 2G: GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900, 3G: HSDPA 850 / 900 / 1900 / 2100, LTE: LTE band 1(2100), 3(1800), 5(850), 7(2600), 8(900), 20(800), 28(700), 38(2600), 40(2300), 41(2500).
